name: The royal plate of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom slightly.
It decreases the users intelligence slightly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (great in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pathetically.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
